message:
SYSTEM: Vidal.Sep19.pdf: Página 9
Page 9
Query Over Heterogeneous Data Sources
●
Query: Drugs with the active substance Simvastatin: 
○
Name of possible drug targets, 
○
Chemical formula of a drug, 
○
Side effects, and
○
Disease Name
Query must be 
evaluated against 
heterogeneous 
sources, that 
potentially suffer of 
quality issues, and 
evolve over time
speaker: SYSTEM
